price: 19. Allah kent het bedrog van de ogen en alles wat de borsten bedekken.
arabic: يَعۡلَمُ خَآئِنَةَ ٱلۡأَعۡيُنِ وَمَا تُخۡفِي ٱلصُّدُورُ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: yaʿlamu khāinata al-aʿyuni wamā tukh'fī al-ṣudūru
